description:
The (lack of) design patterns in Python

Presented at PyCon 2009 by Joe Gregorio

There is a distinct lack of Design Patterns discussed in relation to
Python. Are the communities ignorant of Design Patterns or is there
something else going on here? This talk is based on my well-trafficked
article "Python isn't just Java without the compile" and expands on that
article by using Design Patterns as a crude metric of gaps in a
programming language.

[VIDEO HAS ISSUES: ]
title: PyCon 2009: The (lack of) design patterns in Python (#60)
